item.title: Salesforce 数据显示，全球网络星期一在线销售额达 173 亿美元
item.description: Salesforce 的数据显示，购物者在 "网络星期一 "的网上消费额达 173 亿美元，为 "黑色星期五 "周末画上了句号。【原文：Shoppers spent $17.3 billion online on Cyber Monday, Salesforce data showed, capping the Black Friday weekend.】

item.title: 亚马逊将在西雅图和费城部分地区 30 分钟内送达生活必需品和杂货
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周一表示，它正在西雅图和费城的部分地区测试家庭必需品和新鲜杂货的超快速送货服务，公司将加倍努力扩大其在国内的业务范围。【原文：Amazon.com said on Monday it is testing ultra-fast delivery of household essentials and fresh groceries in parts of Seattle and Philadelphia, as the company doubles down on efforts to grow its domestic footprint.】

item.title: 美国商务部长确认韩国 15%关税税率追溯至 11 月 1 日
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周一证实，由于韩国已向国会提交立法，以落实该国对美国的战略投资承诺，从韩国进口的汽车等商品的一般关税税率将从11月1日起降至15%。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick on Monday confirmed that the general tariff rate on imports from South Korea, including on autos, would drop to 15% retroactive to November 1 because South Korea has introduced legislation in parliament to implement the country's strategic U.S. investment commitments.】

item.title: 交易日 全球因日本利率寒流而颤抖
item.description: 周一，日本央行行长上田一夫暗示本月晚些时候可能升息，冷却了投资者对美国降息预期的乐观情绪，并使 12 月份的交易开局不顺，全球债券收益率上升，股市下跌。【原文：Global bond yields rose and stocks fell on Monday after Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda hinted that interest rates may rise later this month, cooling investor optimism around an expected U.S. rate cut and getting December trading off to a rocky start.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，华纳兄弟 Discovery 获得 Netflix 大部分现金报价
item.description: 据彭博社周一援引知情人士的话报道，华纳兄弟发现公司正在进行第二轮竞标，其中包括 Netflix 提出的以现金为主的报价，拍卖可能在未来几天或几周内结束。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery was fielding a second round of bids, including a mostly cash offer from Netflix , in an auction that could conclude in the coming days or weeks, Bloomberg reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 星巴克将支付 3,890 万美元，以了结纽约市有关工人排班问题的调查
item.description: 纽约市市长埃里克-亚当斯（Eric Adams）办公室周一表示，星巴克已同意支付 3890 万美元，以了结纽约市对该咖啡连锁店在三年内违反当地法律 50 多万次、要求快餐企业为工人提供可预测和稳定的工作时间安排的指控。【原文：Starbucks has agreed to pay $38.9 million to settle claims by New York City that the coffee chain violated a local law requiring fast food businesses to give workers predictable and stable schedules more than half a million times over a three-year period, Mayor Eric Adams' office said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国法官裁定，百时美施贵宝必须面对因癌症药物延期上市而引起的 67 亿美元诉讼
item.description: 一名美国法官周一驳回了百时美施贵宝公司要求驳回一项价值 67 亿美元的诉讼的请求，该诉讼声称百时美施贵宝公司欺骗了前 Celgene 公司的股东，在规定期限内推迟了包括癌症治疗药物 Breyanzi 在内的三种药物的联邦审批。【原文：A U.S. judge on Monday rejected Bristol Myers Squibb's bid to dismiss a $6.7 billion lawsuit claiming it cheated shareholders of the former Celgene by delaying federal approval for three drugs, including the cancer treatment Breyanzi, by specified deadlines.】

item.title: 卢特尼克：美国将从 11 月 1 日起把韩国汽车关税降至 15
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周二表示，美国将把韩国汽车的进口关税下调至15%，生效日期追溯至11月1日，并与日本和欧盟所征收的关税对等。【原文：The U.S. will lower import duties on South Korean autos to 15% effective retroactively to November 1 and match the reciprocal tariffs imposed on Japan and the EU, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 新加坡的 YouTrip 将进入澳大利亚，这是自 COVID-19 大流行以来的第一个新市场
item.description: 总部位于新加坡的金融科技公司 YouTrip 周二表示，它将在澳大利亚推出 COVID-19 大流行后的首个新市场，旨在以此为跳板，进一步向其他高旅行率的亚太市场扩张。【原文：Singapore-based fintech firm YouTrip said on Tuesday it will launch in Australia, its first new market since the COVID-19 pandemic, aiming to use it as a springboard for further expansion into other high-travel Asia-Pacific markets.】

item.title: 好市多起诉美国，要求在特朗普上诉失败后保留关税退款
item.description: 好市多已起诉美国政府，以确保如果最高法院驳回唐纳德-特朗普总统要求全面征收关税的申请，好市多将获得退款。【原文：Costco has sued the U.S. government to ensure it will receive refunds if the Supreme Court rejects President Donald Trump's bid for sweeping authority to impose tariffs.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称雀巢正在探索出售蓝瓶咖啡
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，瑞士食品巨头雀巢公司正在与投资银行摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）合作，审查包括可能出售其蓝瓶咖啡连锁店在内的各种方案。【原文：Swiss food giant Nestlé is working with investment bank Morgan Stanley to review options, including a potential sale, of its Blue Bottle Coffee chain, according to three sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI 收购 Thrive Holdings 股份，将人工智能推向会计和 IT 服务领域
item.description: 作为将人工智能植入会计和 IT 服务等传统行业的合作项目的一部分，聊天工具制造商 OpenAI 已入股私募股权公司 Thrive Holdings。【原文：ChatGPT-maker OpenAI has taken a stake in private equity firm Thrive Holdings as part of a partnership to embed artificial intelligence into traditional industries such as accounting and IT services, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称 Citadel 旗舰基金 11 月份增长 1.4
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Citadel 旗舰基金 Wellington 11 月份的回报率为 1.4%，从而将该基金今年的业绩提升至 8.3%。【原文：Citadel's flagship fund Wellington posted a 1.4% return in November, boosting the fund's performance for the year to 8.3%, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道：美国共和党参议员呼吁司法部和国土安全局调查 Shein 和 Temu 的造假行为
item.description: 阿肯色州的美国共和党参议员汤姆-科顿（Tom Cotton）周一致信司法部长帕姆-邦迪（Pam Bondi），呼吁美国司法部和国土安全部调查网上零售商Shein和Temu（这两家公司的大部分商品都从中国发货）大规模盗窃知识产权和造假的行为。【原文：U.S. Republican Senator Tom Cotton of Arkansas sent a letter to Attorney General Pam Bondi on Monday calling for the U.S. departments of Justice and Homeland Security to investigate online retailers Shein and Temu, which ship most of their merchandise from China, for wide-scale intellectual property theft and counterfeiting.】

item.title: 德克萨斯州总检察长就劳动实践和产品安全问题对Shein公司进行调查
item.description: 得克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）周一表示，他正在对Shein公司进行调查，以确定这家快时尚零售商是否违反了该州有关不道德劳工行为和销售不安全消费品的法律。【原文：Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton said on Monday he is investigating Shein, to determine whether the fast fashion retailer violated state law related to unethical labor practices and the sale of unsafe consumer products.】

item.title: 乌克兰提供 32 亿美元国内生产总值认股权证的债券互换，以摆脱违约困境
item.description: 乌克兰政府周一表示，将向投资者提出用 32 亿美元复杂且成本高昂的国内生产总值认股权证换取国际债券的提议，乌克兰正试图扫清摆脱主权违约的一大障碍。【原文：Ukraine launched an offer to investors to swap $3.2 billion of complex and costly GDP warrants for international bonds on Monday, the government said, as it attempts to clear a major remaining hurdle in its push to emerge from sovereign default.】

item.title: 网络星期一数以千计的用户无法使用 Shopify
item.description: 数以千计的 Shopify , 用户遇到了与登录在线购物平台有关的问题，影响了客户和一些小企业的网络星期一。【原文：Thousands of Shopify , users encountered issues related to logging in to the online shopping platform, impacting customers and several small businesses on Cyber Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道：安博能源公司计划在收购后保留 Citgo 炼油厂
item.description: 接近筹备工作的消息人士称，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的关联公司琥珀能源公司（Amber Energy）计划在完成法院下令的拍卖后，一旦接管 Citgo Petroleum 这家委内瑞拉所有的美国炼油企业，将保留 Citgo Petroleum 的炼油厂、码头和其他相关资产。【原文：Elliott Investment Management's affiliate Amber Energy plans to keep Citgo Petroleum's refineries, terminals and other connected assets once it takes over the Venezuela-owned U.S. refiner, following the completion of a court-ordered auction, sources close to the preparations said.】

item.title: 新日铁高管认为美国钢铁业的疲软表现只是暂时的
item.description: 新日铁的一位高管表示，新收购的美国钢铁部门表现疲软只是暂时的，新日铁将继续致力于投资110亿美元，到2028年将其利润贡献提高到约2500亿日元（16亿美元）。【原文：Nippon Steel sees the weak performance at its newly acquired U.S. Steel unit as temporary and remains committed to investing $11 billion to boost its profit contribution to around 250 billion yen ($1.6 billion) by 2028, an executive said.】

item.title: 英伟达发布用于自动驾驶汽车开发的开源软件
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia）周一发布了新的开源软件，旨在利用人工智能领域的一些最新 "推理 "技术加快自动驾驶汽车的开发。【原文：Nvidia on Monday released new open-source software aimed at speeding up the development of self-driving cars using some of the newest "reasoning" techniques in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州总检察长就劳工行为和产品安全问题对Shein公司进行调查
item.description: 得克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）周一表示，他正在对申银万国进行调查，以确定这家中国快时尚零售商是否违反了该州有关不道德劳工行为和销售不安全消费品的法律。【原文：Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton said on Monday he is investigating Shein, to determine whether the Chinese fast fashion retailer violated state law related to unethical labor practices and the sale of unsafe consumer products.】

item.title: 天气转凉，产量强劲，美国 11 月液化天然气出口创历史新高
item.description: 金融公司 LSEG 周一提供的初步数据显示，受凉爽天气和美国两大液化天然气生产商强劲产量的推动，11 月份美国液化天然气出口量连续第二个月创下历史单月新高。【原文：U.S. liquefied natural gas exports hit an all-time monthly high in November for the second straight month, driven by cooler weather and robust output from the country's two largest producers, preliminary data from financial firm LSEG showed on Monday.】

item.title: 大空头 "投资者伯利抨击人工智能估值后瞄准特斯拉
item.description: "大空头 "投资人迈克尔-伯里（Michael Burry）在一篇博文中将矛头对准了电动汽车制造商特斯拉，称埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的这家公司 "被高估得离谱"，几天前他还表达了对当前人工智能热潮的担忧。【原文："The Big Short" investor Michael Burry took aim at electric automaker Tesla in a blog post, saying the Elon Musk-led company is "ridiculously overvalued", days after he voiced concerns about the current AI boom.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，Blackstone 考虑放弃竞购英国大黄集团
item.description: 据天空新闻周一援引熟悉此事的消息人士的话报道，Blackstone 正在 "认真考虑 "放弃对英国自助仓储公司 Big Yellow Group 的竞购，以迎接即将到来的确定出价截止日期。【原文：Blackstone is "seriously contemplating" abandoning its bid for British self-storage company Big Yellow Group ahead of the upcoming deadline for a firm offer, Sky News reported on Monday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士和德国当局在打击洗钱活动中关闭了 cryptomixer.io 网站
item.description: 一组瑞士和德国执法机构周一表示，他们关闭了 cryptomixer.io，这是掩盖非法活动比特币转账踪迹的最大平台之一。【原文：A group of Swiss and German law enforcement agencies said on Monday they shut down cryptomixer.io, one of the largest platforms to cover up the tracks of bitcoin transfers from illegal activities.】

item.title: 11 月美国制造业下滑加剧
item.description: 11 月份，美国制造业连续第九个月萎缩，工厂面临订单下滑和投入品价格上涨的问题，而进口关税的拖累仍在持续。【原文：U.S. manufacturing contracted for the ninth straight month in November, with factories facing slumping orders and higher prices for inputs as the drag from import tariffs persisted.】

item.title: VTB 首席执行官称俄罗斯企业正瞄准全球南部进行扩张
item.description: 俄罗斯第二大银行 VTB 首席执行官安德烈-科斯汀（Andrei Kostin）告诉路透社记者，尽管受到西方制裁，但俄罗斯公司仍在关注全球南方国家的扩张机会，并仍有全球雄心。【原文：Russian companies are eyeing expansion opportunities in the countries of the Global South and still have global ambitions despite Western sanctions, Andrei Kostin, the CEO of Russia's second-largest bank, VTB, told Reuters.】

item.title: 锋利笔制造商 Newell Brands 将裁员 900 人，并承担高达 9000 万美元的费用
item.description: 纽威品牌公司（Newell Brands）周一表示，将裁员 900 人，占其全球员工总数的 3.8%，并承担高达 9000 万美元的重组费用。【原文：Newell Brands will cut 900 jobs, or 3.8% of its global workforce, and take up to $90 million in restructuring charges, the Sharpie maker said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国周日筛查出创纪录的 313 万名航空旅客
item.description: 美国运输安全管理局（U.S. Transportation Security Administration）表示，周日共安检了 313 万名航空公司乘客，创下单日最高安检人数。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Security Administration said it screened 3.13 million airline passengers on Sunday, the highest number ever on a single day.】

item.title: 埃森哲与 OpenAI 合作，为数千名员工配备 ChatGPT
item.description: 埃森哲将通过与 OpenAI 合作，为其数以万计的 IT 专业人员配备 ChatGPT Enterprise，因为这家咨询公司希望利用人工智能服务日益增长的需求。【原文：Accenture will equip tens of thousands of its IT professionals with ChatGPT Enterprise through a partnership with OpenAI, as the consulting firm looks to capitalize on the growing demand for AI services.】
